name: Andromex3
overview: Programming: Roberto Ricioppo (Created using Sideways SEUCK) Graphics: Roberto Ricioppo Music: Roberto Ricioppo Genre: Shoot 'Em Up (SEUCK) Tape Loader: Joonas Lindberg (Mastered using LoadOne) Release Year: 2013 Also Known As: Andromex X3 This is a simple shoot 'em up game in which you control a space ship, fighting against the alien forces. Like many games which involve shooting aliens, it is your job to save the universal threat of an invasion throughout the galaxy. :)
